name: dds.wasm
description: A webassembly wrapper that allows to view dds images in the browser
author: Remixer Dec

scripts.compile: emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -g0 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' -I dds/ src/wrapper.c  lib/dds/dds.c -o lib/generated/dds.js
scripts.create-container: docker run -d --name emsdk -v $PWD:/mnt  rickardp/emscripten-devcontainer:2.0.12 sleep Infinity
scripts.update-container: docker exec emsdk bash -c "apt update && apt install tar && cd /emsdk/ && git fetch && git checkout main && git pull && ./emsdk install latest && ./emsdk activate latest && echo 'source /emsdk/emsdk_env.sh' >> ~/.bashrc"
scripts.build-pages: npx vite build --base=./ && mv dist/ /tmp/dist && git checkout gh-pages && rm -rf ./assets && mv /tmp/dist/* .
